body:
Im more interested in "how did they know about this?" im a huge fan of etrian series and this is the first time I ever heard about this. really this people are just hunting how to be offended. in any case I disaprove all the witch hunts, its not fair for the artist and seriously they are real problems in this world to be wasting time with this
.
This is why people in twitter shouldn't be allowed to go anywhere else but twitter, stop being so fucking stuck up over a character skin
Brugh this man realy came here to do this
imagine being a fucking loser like the dude below me

Can believe this... This is what you decided to spend your artistic talent doing? Giving pedophiles something to jerk it to? Congratulations on being a fucking dipshit and also congratulations on ruining Resplendant Lucina, all of Twitter is very happy with you.
He's responsible for all Etrian Odyssey character designs, and you can easily tell he's a lolicon from those.
So this is the person who drew the fae, lugh and ray artwork. Nice
